casebody.data:
CTB Realty Services, Inc. v. Geoffrey Foston et al. (13492)

Heiman, Speak and Hennessy, Js.

Submitted on briefs December 2 decision released December 20, 1994 Geoffrey Foston, pro se, the appellant (named defendant), filed a brief. Joseph E. Faughnan and Peter G. Kruzynski filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded to the trial court for the purpose of setting new law days.
